thread.title: LG Electronics says first quarter profit likely rose 20 pct, above expectations

title: LG Electronics says first quarter profit likely rose 20 pct, above expectations
text:
April 6, 2018 / 6:36 AM / Updated 29 minutes ago LG Electronics says first quarter profit likely rose 20 percent, above expectations Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
SEOUL (Reuters) - South Koreaâ€™s LG Electronics Inc ( 066570.KS ) said on Friday first-quarter operating profit likely rose 20 percent from a year earlier, beating market expectations. FILE PHOTO: The LG logo is seen on a washing machine in Singapore January 26, 2018. REUTERS/Thomas White/File Photo 
LG estimated January-March profit at 1.1 trillion won ($1.03 billion) versus a Thomson Reuters StarMine SmartEstimate of 935 billion won from a poll of 16 analysts. 
Revenue likely climbed 3 percent to 15.1 trillion won, compared with a 15.4 trillion won projected by SmartEstimate, which gives greater weight to recent estimates by analysts who are more consistently accurate. 
The firm will disclose full results at the end of April. Reporting by Joyce Lee; Editing by Gopakumar Warrier
